    • swipePen

      public static void swipePen​(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument pdd, String name, String place, String reason, byte[] file, PdfSignature signature) throws IOException
      Adds a PDSignature object to a given PDDocument object.
      Parameters:
      pdd - PDDocument representation of a .PDF.
      name - Name of the signed.
      place - The location in which the signature occurs.
      reason - The reason for the signature process.
      file - Document's bytes.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getReady

      protected static org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.interactive.digitalsignature.PDSignature getReady​(String name, String place, String reason, byte[] file)
      Sets the fields of a PDSignature according to the below parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - Signer's name.
      place - Where the signature occurs.
      reason - for the signature process.
      file - Document's bytes.
      Returns:
      A PDSignature object to be added to a PDDocument object.
